songs.title: Fuego
songs.album: SPIN CITY Vol. 1: Classic 90s & New School Underground
songs.lyrics:
[Hook: La Bruja]
Tú nunca llegaras a quemar lo que quemo yo [x2]
No quieres jugar con mi fuego
Ten mucho cuidado que te quemo
No puedes jugar con mi fuego
Ten mucho cuidado que te quemo
Tate quieto cuando entro que te quemar con mi fuego [x2]

[Verse 1: B-Real]
I'll make you burn like the green that I stick in my pipe
Feel the heat, scorchin' niggas with my flame on site
It's the real one, still some question the tactics
I flip shit daily like it's fucking gymnastics
Some call me brujo, greñudo, ya estuvo, but you know
Better than to fuck around with [?]
Rhymes kick quicker than triggers click
You ask why (why?)
You play props with your life so your ass dies
We smoke you, burn you like cash
And we double toke you when you turn to ash
And you soft ass busters fall apart and crumble
Talk shit, mumble, can't stay on the humble
But I got the remedy, remember me nigga
I'm gonna put you through it's remedies nigga
The serial rhyme killer, you understand dog?
Don't get too close, I'll burn your hands off

[Hook: La Bruja]
Tú nunca llegaras a quemar lo que quemo yo [x2]
No quieres jugar con mi fuego
Ten mucho cuidao que te quemo
No puedes jugar con mi fuego
Ten mucho cuidado, pendejo
Tate quieto cuando entro que te quemo con mi fuego [x2﻿]

[Verse 2: B-Real]
The flame burns eternal, the inferno gets higher degrees-wise
Some [?] up my journal
For all those concerned, don't hesitate and learn slow
'Cause it's hot in hell, and you burn slow
Magazines, emcees, the entries, [?]
Hollow heart, so make me spit dark to tempt me
'Cause clearly, you ain't no friend of Real
But like superman, yo' punk I'm bending steel
Bitches quit trippin' and offendin' Real
You wanna act hard? I see you pretendin' still
Bitch, bump yo' head, take a Benadryl
'Cause you ain't got no friends and no ends to build up
Any momentum, but one moment please
'Cause all live bullets will get fucked with [?]
It's freeze nigga (freeze nigga)
[?] You lost your mind
You think you can fuck with me, it'll cost ya'
Bring any rapper on your roster
I'll toss them out until there's no-one left to call up

(don't trip) x5

[Hook: La Bruja]
Tú nunca llegaras a quemar lo que quemo yo [x2]
No quieres jugar con mi fuego
Ten mucho cuidado que te quemo
No puedes jugar con mi fuego
Ten mucho cuidado,pendejo
Tate quieto cuando entro que te quemo con mi fuego [x2﻿]
